basic.description: The topics included will vary from one year to the next, based on the instructor¿s expertise, as well as on the state of the financial markets and the economy. The main objective is to prepare students to communicate in a professional manner within the specialized field of finance, and with due regard for current industry trends and practices. The course will recognize the need to communicate effectively and professionally in various situations including: verbal presentations; written reports; dealing with clients, fellow colleagues and superiors; networking situations; conflict resolution; etc.
basic.subject: MFIN
basic.title: Communication & Finance
